item.description:
Ever wonder if you've lived before?  Ever met someone and felt like you already know them?  Do you have skills and talents for which you've never had training?

Kathryn McGlynn, Certified Hypnotist and Time Traveler, leads you on a hypnotic exploration of your other lives where you will discover how they may be affecting your current life and relationships.

Learning about past lives can be helpful in physical healing, removing fears and apprehensions, releasing oneself from unwanted behaviors, clarifying life purpose and core values, recognizing people we have known before, and understanding issues in relationships.

Bring a small pillow and light blanket if desired.  You will be invited to stretch out and relax.

A free hypnosis CD is included as Kathryn's gift to you!

Please contact Roberta Cottrell at The Reiki Room to preregister.

Tickets: $35.00

group.name: Past Life Regression & Professional Hypnosis Group

item.name: HYPNOSIS SEMINAR : Past Life Regression
